citations.narrative:
Pen #7 needs to be addressed. There is a section of the wall panel that has been scratched to the point that there are
three small holes in the panel. The scratching has deteriorated this section of the panel to where it can no longer be
effectively cleaned and sanitized and could pose a potential hazard to the dog. This section of the primary enclosure must
be kept in good repair for the safety of the dog.
Correct by: Nov 30, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.6(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Pen #7 needs to be addressed. There is a section of the wall panel that has been scratched to the point that there are 
three small holes in the panel. The scratching has deteriorated this section of the panel to where it can no longer be 
effectively cleaned and sanitized and could pose a potential hazard to the dog. This section of the primary enclosure must 
be kept in good repair for the safety of the dog.  
 
Correct by: Nov 30, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
